name: Mushroom Mamma
description:
A fun little arcade type game made for Mini Game Jam #57 - UNDERGROUND

Mushroom Mamma is trying to protect her babies! Knock away the pigs by holding down the mouse button to move into them. Kill them by knocking them into the water.

This is our first game jam ever. It was super fun! Thanks to all of ya'll who were apart of it, ya'll were awesome and cool.

All Programming done by me, all art assets done by Jay https://twitter.com/everybodyska
